dataList.name: Silence
dataList.desc:
When hit by an attack, self-apply 5 Bind next turn, and deal +20% damage when attacking with a type or affinity the target is 'Weak' or 'Fatal' to.
(Once per turn)

dataList.name: Ember
dataList.desc: On clash win, inflict Burn by (Wrath Abs. / 2) (Once per skill)

dataList.name: Dol Hareubang
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 3 Blunt Protection and Sloth Protection

dataList.name: Ennui
dataList.desc: Attack Skill Final Power +2. If 10+ turns into the battle, gain 2 Protection every turn, but lower attack skill final power by 2.

dataList.name: Liquid Veil
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Apply 2 Protection to the ally with the lowest HP (Including self)

dataList.name: It Hurts!
dataList.desc: +10% damage for every negative status effect on this unit (Up to 50%)

dataList.name: Immoderate Passion
dataList.desc: At the start of combat phase, self-apply Haste and Defense Power Down next turn by (Lust Abs. / 2) this turn.

dataList.name: Wave of Depression
dataList.desc:
Target of the rightmost skill on the dashboard loses SP by (2x Gloom Abs.) after the attack
(Abnormalities take Gloom damage instead)

dataList.name: Art
dataList.desc: At the start of combat phase, self-apply Slash DMG Up and Fragile by (Wrath Abs. /2) this turn

dataList.name: 4th Match Flame
dataList.desc: Every 4th skill used gains +4 Final Power, and inflicts 4 Burn with each of its attack

dataList.name: Refusal to Judge
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, self-apply 3 Protection if the unit is targeted by 3 or more skills

dataList.name: Final Augmentation
dataList.desc: If the E.G.O Skill <You Want To Get Beat? Hurtily?> is used at less than 25% HP, self-apply 3 Attack Power Up, Defense Power Up, and Haste every turn, but die in 3 turns.

dataList.name: Revelation from Above
dataList.desc: After winning a clash with the leftmost skill in the dashboard, apply 1 Attack Power Up or Defense Power Up to a random ally next turn

dataList.name: Ripple
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Heal SP for the ally with the lowest SP by (Gloom Abs.), excluding those in panic

dataList.name: Binding Ribbons
dataList.desc: Target of the leftmost skill on the dashboard is inflicted with (Lust Abs. / 4) Lust Fragility next turn

dataList.name: Vying Spirit
dataList.desc: When another ally defeats an enemy, self-apply 2 Attack Power Up, 2 Haste, and 4 Fragile next turn

dataList.name: Roar
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy, gain Charge by (Envy Abs. / 2) of that turn

dataList.name: 钻穿
dataList.desc: 进行有利拼点时威力+2 进行不利拼点时威力-2

dataList.name: 玫红绸带
dataList.desc: 拼点胜利时，下回合对目标施加3层玫红绸带与束缚

dataList.name: 浴火
dataList.desc: 击中目标时，如果目标处于烧伤，则会对随机3个敌方角色施加1层烧伤

dataList.name: Severance
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 1 Slash DMG Up. Lose 10 SP whenever a unit on either side dies.

dataList.name: Spark of Flame
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy that has Burn, heal HP by (Wrath Abs.)% of max HP

dataList.name: Coldness
dataList.desc: On hit, if the target had 5+ Sinking, inflict 1 Bind and Attack Power Down (3 times per unit)

dataList.name: Unstable
dataList.desc:
At the start of combat phase, gain Attack Power Up by (Gluttony Abs. / 2)
Next turn, self-apply that much Attack Power Down, and the above effect doesn't activate

dataList.name: Live Offering
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy with an attack or counter skill, gain 5 E.G.O resources of the skill's affinity

dataList.name: Tactical Perfection
dataList.desc: If the unit did not get hit at all during a turn, gain 1 Damage Up next turn

dataList.name: Stem of Distrust
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Gain 1 Pierce DMG Up
On hit with a Heads coin, inflict 1 Bind and +1 Rupture count next turn

dataList.name: Emptying
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 1 Lust DMG Up. Gain 1 more at less than 0 SP

dataList.name: Uncontrolled Morph
dataList.desc: Turn Start: At less than 25% HP, heal 15 HP and gain 2 Protection; A random other ally loses 15 SP

dataList.name: Maggots
dataList.desc: On hit, inflict 5 Maggots at a (Gluttony Abs. x8)% chance

dataList.name: Nutrient Absorption
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy that has Rupture, heal HP by (Gluttony Abs.)% of max HP
